attributes.action: Make it essential for all pregnant women to be tested for Group B Strep
attributes.additional_details: Make it a free obligatory test offered to all pregnant women in the UK.
attributes.background:
There are too many babies and
Mothers lost now to this awful bacterial infection common in 40% of
Women. We want it to be essential that all mothers are swabbed and if positive administered simple antibiotics to prevent loss of life, critical illness and long term brain damage.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590071
